alert.note: Alert for Christian (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 2:19AM CDT until May 07 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Missouri, including the following counties, Christian, Stone and Webster. * WHEN...Until 800 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 218 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated slow moving thunderstorms with very heavy rainfall across the warned area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following low water crossings... Finley River at Johns Ford Road, Wilson`s Creek at Old Limey Road, Green Valley Creek at Holder RD, James River at Bell Ford Road and Little Crane Creek at Old Wire Road. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Southern Springfield, Nixa, Ozark, Marshfield, Highlandville, Rogersville, Clever and Seymour. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
